com.sponsorpay.publisher.interstitial

Class SPInterstitialClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sponsorpay.publisher.interstitial.SPInterstitialClient

  • public class SPInterstitialClient
extends Object

    Provides methods to request and show Interstitial Ads and notifies its listener SPInterstitialAdListener of the ad status result.

    Before requesting an ad, make sure the have called the SponsorPay.start(String, String, String, Activity) method. At this point you can determine if offers are available with requestAds(SPCredentials, Activity). When an ad is closed, you must restart the process, querying for new ads before being able to display any ad again. Note - Offer availability (requestAds(SPCredentials, Activity)) cannot be requested while an ad is being displayed. Call canRequestAds() if you're not sure that this instance is in a state in which a request for offers is possible.

    • Method Detail

      • requestAds

        public boolean requestAds(SPCredentials credentials,
                 Activity activity)
        Queries the server for Interstitial ads availability. Ads availability cannot be requested while an ad is being displayed or the server is currently being queried. Call canRequestAds() if you're not sure that this instance is in a state in which a request for ads is possible.
        Parameters:
        credentials - The credentials that will be used for this query.
        activity - The calling activity
        Returns:
        true if a request is being made, false otherwise
        See Also:
        SPCredentials, SponsorPay.start(String, String, String, Activity)

      • canRequestAds

        public boolean canRequestAds()
        Returns:
        true if the client is in a state that allows to request for ads, false otherwise

      • setCustomParameters

        public boolean setCustomParameters(Map<String,String> parameters)
        Sets the additional custom parameters used for this ad.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The additional parameters map
        Returns:
        true if successful in setting the parameters, false otherwise

        public void processAds(SPInterstitialAd[] ads)

        Parameters:
        ad - the ad to be shown

      • validateAd

        public boolean validateAd(SPInterstitialAd ad)
        Called to validate if an ad from the mediated network is avaialble
        Parameters:
        ad - the ad to be validated
        Returns:
        true if an ad is available, false otherwise

      • showInterstitial

        public boolean showInterstitial(Activity parentActivity)
        Starts an available interstitial ad.
        Parameters:
        parentActivity - The activity that will be used to show the engagement
        Returns:
        true if the ad can be shown

        event - the event to be fired
